meeting_info.organization: Grand Park South TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development
Thor Erickson, Assistant Director, Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 3 through 4.
Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the November 30, 2023 Grand Park South TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion regarding implementation by the City’s Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department of the City’s new Housing Policy (DHP33).
agenda_items.description: Including Equity Strategy Target Areas, including a recommended target area for the Department of Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization to deploy funding to be annually transferred from the Deep Ellum TIF District for homeowner stabilization and displacement mitigation programs (including home repair/improvement programs and homebuyer assistance programs) in the Grand Park South area.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development; Thor Erickson, Assistant Director, Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department
